JOINPage :: 2
The Scheduled Property in Markapuram Mandal, Markapuram Municipality, which I have inherited from my ancestors, and which I have the right to, and which I enjoy indisputably, with my full right of enjoyment, with the rights of donation, exchange, sale, and sale, as per the Scheduled Property, since you are my wife, I want to arrange some real estate to provide you with a happy life, and considering love as the reward, I have given you the real estate worth Rs. 5,16,000/- literally five lakh sixteen thousand rupees, free of charge, and have taken possession of it through this settlement deed.
Therefore, from now on, you are the rightful owner of the said property and you shall enjoy it for your children and grandchildren, by paying the government fees and panchayat taxes, with the rights of donation, exchange and sale. Neither I nor my other heirs have any rights or powers over the property as per the schedule.
I am able to settle any disputes arising from any party regarding the schedule property at my own expense without any dispute with you and settle the said disputes with you. This is a real estate settlement deed signed and given with my consent.

Town Planning Department - Markapuram Municipal Council Survey No. 456/2 and 1409 Survey Report with survey measurements of the house site -
Regarding.
Indicators: 1. Application filed by Sri Tangirala Yakobu father Lazarus Markapuram dated:
18.11.2025.
2. Remarks of the Town Surveyor of this office dated:
19.12.2025.
*****
Residents of Vemulakota village, Markapuram mandal, Sri Tangirala Yakobu father Lazarus Markapuram Survey No. 456/2 and 1409, that there is a house plot in the municipality, and that a survey certificate has been requested from the municipality to pay tax on the said plot, and the survey measurements have been taken and the survey report has been requested through the index '1' above.
As per the said petition, the Commissioner has visited the place as per his instructions as per the notice given to the petitioners. The petitioners have been informed about the place as per their experience. The land shown by the petitioners is shown as Survey No. 456/2.
The petitioners have been informed about the measurements and stones have been laid. The matter has been informed about the matter through an endorsement. The petitioner has been informed about the matter through an endorsement.
The survey number/sub-division number of the property shown by the applicants should be treated as a certificate only. It is not a certificate of title to the property. If there are any objections to this survey, an appeal may be filed with the Deputy Inspector of Survey, Revenue Divisional Office, Markapuram Division within 30 days. To: Sri Tangirala Yakobu
Father Lazarus,
Markapuram
COMMISSIONER
Madhapuram Municipal Corporation

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 10376 of 2025, dated 26/Dec/2025, executed by Thangirala Yacobu in favour of his Wife, Thangirala Bujjemma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 135.55 Sq. Yds. (or) 1219.95 Sq. Ft., comprised in survey number 456-2, situated in Markapuram Village and Grama Panchayat, Markapuram Mandal, within the District of Prakasam, registered at sub-registrar office Markapuram(811), is bounded as follows: North by: Building of Siitla Saheb and Vacant LandSultan South by: Road East by: Road West by: House of Ganjai Allurayya

(A) As per the Registered Documents: 1. TThe property in survey number 456-2, situated in Markapuram, measuring about 135.55 Sq. Yds. (or) 1219.95 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by Thangirala Yacobu, who acquired the property through Inheritance from his Ancestor.Ref: Deed 2. TThe aforementioned Thangirala Yacobu executed a Gift Settlement Deed, on 26/Dec/2025, registered as document No. 10376 of 2025, before the SRO Markapuram(811), in favour of his Wife, Thangirala Bujjemma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 135.55 Sq. Yds. (or) 1219.95 Sq. Ft., comprised in survey number 456-2, situated in Markapuram.[Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.] Note: The pledging document was registered on 26/Dec/2025, which is less than three months. Hence, F.I. is to obtain internal approval from appropriate authority before disbursement of the loan. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title: Note: It is to be noted that the HTR was not attached in this case, when the same is enquired with F.I., they reverted to release a conditional report. It is therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain HTR prior to the disbursement of the loan.
The mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Thangirala Bujjemma.

sections.content:
We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Thangirala Bujjemma, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring  135.55 Sq. Yds. (or) 1219.95 Sq. Ft., comprised in survey number 456-2, situated in Markapuram Village and Grama Panchayat, Markapuram Mandal, within the District of Prakasam, registered at sub-registrar office Markapuram(811).

Further, the current owner, Thangirala Bujjemma is to be added as a party to the loan structure along with the applicant Thangirala Yacobu.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
